alert.note: Alert for Delaware (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 6:30PM EDT until June 08 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Delaware County in east central Indiana... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 630 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hartford City to 6 miles south of Matthews, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Albany around 650 PM EDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Indiana.
